word_mean: 长期无雨或少雨导致土壤和空气干燥的现象。
由于天然降水和人工灌溉补水不足，致使土壤水分欠缺，不能满足农作物、林果和牧草生长的需要，造成减产或绝产的灾害。

sentence.Network_en: The path was dry and slithery from the drought.
sentence.Network_cn: 小路因干旱变得又干又滑。

sentence.Network_en: Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。

sentence.Network_en: In fact many food crops failed because of the drought.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上，因为干旱，很多粮食作物歉收。

list.abs: 土壤水分亏缺是由长期低的降雨量和大的蒸发量所致，由土壤水分亏缺导致的干旱胁迫（drought stress）是限制干旱区植物生存和生长发育的关键因素。
抵抗力的英语怎么说_百度知道 ... driving resistance 打桩阻力 drought resistance 耐旱性, 抗旱性 drug resistance 药物抗性.
抵抗力的英语怎么说_百度知道 ... driving resistance 打桩阻力 drought resistance 耐旱性, 抗旱性 drug resistance 药物抗性.
soil disinfector 土壤消毒器soil drought 土壤干旱soil ecology 土壤生态学
...oil drought) 因土壤中缺乏可供植物吸收利用的水，使植物体内水分亏缺，发生永久萎焉的现象。26．生理干旱(physiological drought) 由于土温过低、土壤溶液浓度过高或土壤缺氧等原因，妨碍根系吸水，造成植物体内水分亏缺的现象。27．水合补偿点(hydration compensation point) 缺水导致光合速率降低，.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English drūgath 'dryness', of Germanic origin; compare with Dutch droogte; related to dry

entry.def: A drought is a long period of time during which no rain falls.

example.ex: Drought and famines have killed up to two million people here.
example.tran: 旱灾和饥荒夺去了这里200万人的生命。

example.ex: He told a press conference that Spain was suffering one of the worst droughts of the century.
example.tran: 他在记者招待会上说西班牙正遭受着本世纪最严重的旱灾之一。

auth_sentence.content: Can the spendthrift Yankees break their World Series drought?
auth_sentence.res_content: Can the spendthrift Yankees break their World Series drought?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Can the spendthrift Yankees break their World Series drought?

auth_sentence.content: It's idealogy, not drought that causes wars.

auth_sentence.content: This drought really has been a long time coming.

Sentence.sentence: Uncommonly severe droughts brought on by global climate changes have led to forest-eating wildfires from Australia to Indonesia, but nowhere more acutely than in the Amazon.
Trees need more water as temperatures rise, but the prolonged droughts have robbed them of moisture, making whole forests easily cleared of trees and turned into farmland
The picture worsens with each round of El Nino, the unusually warm currents in the Pacific Ocean that drive up temperatures and invariably presage (预示) droughts and fires in the rain forest.

sentences.en: The crops failed because of the drought.
A severe drought hit southwest China, leaving more than 16 million people and 11 million livestock with drinking water shortages.
sentences.cn: 一场严重的旱灾侵袭了中国西南部，造成超过1600万人及1100万牲畜饮水困难。

jushi.english: The crops failed because of the drought.
The stream ran dry in drought.
